attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Don’t download this app it’s going to be a waste of your time I opened up the app and I saw the most horrible man ever not worth your time

attributes.title: this app killed my computer
attributes.review: this app instantly downloaded a virus onto my computer and then i had to reset the entire thing and when it finally turned back on, the virus popped right back up again. i now have to purchase an entire new computer due to this cheeto mans app. -10 starts

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible
attributes.review: ugh i just downloaded it and i see a horrible creature on the front page 🤮

attributes.title: HELP
attributes.review: someone pls help me I downloaded this app to learn more about politics but this scary looking Cheeto man with a tupet jumped out of my screen and is now terrorizing me!!! He won’t get out of my apartment and he keeps screaming maga??? WHATS MAGA?!?!?

attributes.title: Mobile phone number
attributes.review: I’m giving this a 1 star review because they shouldn’t need my phone number. That’s not very nice

attributes.title: Tiktok
attributes.review: absolutely horrible app. don’t why they brought it up in the first place. I would rate it 0 stars but I have to make it 1. disappointing app.

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: Hello fellow K-pop Stan right here! Anyways this app was completely terrible every time you opened the app it would kick you right out like 👏👏 I was trying to support the mr. president guy 🥺😭

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP 😾😖🖐🏾
attributes.review: this app is the worst!right when i opened it, it started showing me racist, homophobic, transphobic , islamophobic, and hateful news! it’s a terrible app and i will never use it again!!!!!

attributes.title: trash
attributes.review: now why would I want to keep up with a stupid, racist, misogynistic, rapist who is constantly feeding the world inaccurate information all the time?
Once i opened the app it told me i was fat 😔💔. Then it proceded to insult me and my family 🙄. My phone got so laggy after i got the app i couldn’t even text my mother😾.
